productName: Memory Sync Round 6 — Arising, Government Grants, Interns, Coaching & Commercial Properties
overview: Extract facts from Jay's Notion workspace covering Arising Packaging (Jas Teo's company), Smart Tech Up / government grant programmes, Prisma intern pipeline, business coaching with Daniel, Taman Teratai commercial property, Federation Oil Factory, yearly summaries & life milestones, staff operations, Juggernaut methodology, and language learning. Push atomic memories to Mem0 Cloud (api.mem0.ai). No code changes — purely API operations.
goals: Document Arising Packaging company and associated entities (RSE, RSP, JSE)
Capture Smart Tech Up CI registration, RFP opportunities, and capital market funding
Record Prisma intern pipeline — names, roles, interview SOPs, onboarding
Map business coaching sessions with Daniel Stellar
Document Taman Teratai commercial property operations and tenants
Capture Federation Oil Factory as Prisma client
Extract yearly summaries and life milestones timeline
Record staff operations — attendance, payroll, Myanmar recruitment
Document Juggernaut Labs methodology and process
Each fact is atomic: one subject, one predicate, retrievable via semantic search

userStories.title: Arising Packaging & Associated Companies (RSE/RSP/JSE)
userStories.description: Fetch Arising company page, annual revenue of RSE/RSP/JSE/Arising, and related pages. Extract: Arising founding details (Jas Teo, July 2024), blow molding manufacturing, West Port Klang expansion, RSE/RSP/JSE company codes, annual revenues, relationship to Prisma.
acceptanceCriteria: Fetch Arising company page, annual revenue page, and related SSM pages
Extract: founding details, business type, revenues, expansion plans
Push 8-10 atomic facts about Arising and associated companies
Verify via Mem0 search for 'Arising' and 'RSE RSP JSE'
notionSearchQueries: annual revenue of rse, rsp, jse, arising

acceptanceCriteria: Fetch Smart Tech Up, CI submission, capital market, GDPM pages

Push 8-10 atomic facts about government grants and funding
Verify via Mem0 search for 'Smart Tech Up' and 'GDPM'
notionSearchQueries: Smart Tech Up CI Registration RFP Opportunities
Edit and modify Crowd Innovator CI submission presentation
Proposal for Business Fund Consultancy company
